timeline.bodyText:
No, an overwrite is not the thing to do here. You can easily make this a cancellable injection at the head of the method instead. Overwrites should be used as a last resort.
Also, if pos is loaded, pos.down() will be loaded as it'll be in the same chunk, right? You can drop the .down() call in the injection to remove a method call.
